name: Chocolate molten cakes
description: A luxurious dessert that combines the indulgent richness of chocolate with a delightful surprise of molten goodness at its center, making it a favorite choice for those seeking the ultimate chocolate experience.

name: Pistachio tiramisu
description: Delight guests with a pistachio twist on tiramisu, with a pistachio cream filling and pistachio topping. It's a perfect dessert for a dinner party.

name: Salted chocolate & hazelnut brownies
description: Chocolate hazelnut spread ensures these moreish brownies have a fudgy centre. Flecked with pecans and sea salt.

name: Floating islands
description: Whip up some floating islands at your next dinner party, the retro-cool French dessert featuring cr√®me anglaise, meringue and caramel.
